Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • Main
  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    The Main class provides methods for matrix operations such as addition, multiplication, and scalar calculations, along with handling user input and file operations.

      • calculateMode

        public static int calculateMode​(int[] array)
        Calculates the mode of the elements in the array. In case of a tie, returns the first mode found.
        Parameters:
        array - The array of integers
        Returns:
        The mode value

      • text_to_enc

        public static java.lang.String text_to_enc​(java.lang.String message,
                                           int number)
        Parameters:
        message - Holds the message received from the user
        number - holds the number received from the user
        Returns:
        returns encrypted massage The message is encrypted. If there are no letters left due to the encryption number of the message, it continues from the end of the alphabet.

      • text_to_dec

        public static java.lang.String text_to_dec​(java.lang.String message,
                                           int number)
        Parameters:
        message - Holds the message received from the user
        number - keeps count from user
        Returns:
        returns decrypted message The part that sends the parts necessary to decode the code to another method
